title: Lumiere Is A Time Traveler! 🕯️ (Disney) #shorts
description:
Beauty and The Beast is a Disney CLASSIC. One of those movies that remained one of Disney's greatest successes, but what if I told you, that in classic Film Theory fashion, you were MISSING a huge detail about that movie? Something that would change how we view one of those characters FOREVER?
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
*Credits:*
Writers: Matthew Patrick, Forrest Lee and Eddie “NostalGamer” Robinson
Editor: Shnaia "Naya" Llamera
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman
